description:
Smart. Focused. Email.

Fast, cross-platform email designed to filter out the noise - so you can focus on what's important.
Hey everyone!
There’s more than meets the eye in today’s small, yet mighty update to Spark:

- Improved mini-calendar with clearer highlighting of current day and easier selection of month and year
- The "Meet with..." feature now displays available slots for the entire week, with an updated design for a more cohesive look.
- The "Meet with..." feature is now available in both Day and Month calendar views, offering broader usability.
- Adjusted logic for calculating free time slots within the "Meet with..." feature
- Updated the user interface for pending invitations to provide clearer status visibility.
- Events now show a slight shift in creation date on the day view, enhancing timeline accuracy.
- Fixed an issue where switching focus to another event preview while creating a new event could not cause an error.

Thank you for choosing Spark! We value your feedback. Please contact us at support@sparkmailapp.com if you have any suggestions or issues.
